Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking.message

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActivateLeaderMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to activate a certain LeaderCard
    ActivateProductionMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to activate the production.
    Broadcast  
    BuyCardMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to buy a certain DevCard.
    CheatRequestMessage  
    ChooseLeaderMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to discard some leaderCards (initial stage of the game)
    ChooseResourcesMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to pick resource(s) and the index of the warehouse where he wants to add the chosen resources(s) (initial stage of the game).
    Client2Server  
    ClientAcceptedMessage
    Packet used to send the player that the chosen nickname is valid
    ClientInputResponse
    Packet used to send the player a response to one of his commands
    ConvertWhiteMarbleMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to convert a white marble into an other type of marble.
    DevCardPaymentMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the pay a certain type of resource he has to pay in order to buy a DevCard.
    DiscardLeaderMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to discard a certain LeaderCard It contains the index of the Leader Card he wants to discard (human readable)
    DiscardMarbleMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to discard a marble of the ones he received after a market action It contains the index of the marble he wants to discard (human readable).
    EndTurnMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to end his turn.
    GameStartedMessage  
    InsertDevCardInDevSlotMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to insert a Development Card he just bought in a certain slot in the production-zone of his personal board.
    InsertMarbleMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to insert a marble in a certain row or column of the market.
    LoginSettingMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to use a certain nickname
    Message  
    MoveFromExtraDepotMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to move resources from an extraDepot to a depot of the warehouse.
    MoveToExtraDepotMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to move resources from an extraDepot to a depot of the warehouse.
    NumOfPlayerMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the first player of the game to set the number of players that the game will have
    PingMessage
    Ping message
    PlacementDevCardMessage
    This message is sent from the server to the client to send him the card he just bought
    PlayerIsQuittingMessage  
    PlayerIsRejoiningMessage  
    ProductionPaymentMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to pay resources necessary in order to complete the production.
    RemoveClientForErrors  
    S2CPlayersNumberMessage  
    Server2Client  
    SetLeadersMessage  
    SetNicknameMessage  
    SetPlayersNumMessage  
    StartTurnMessage
    Packet sent from players to the players in order to tell them whose player the turn is
    StoreResourceInExtraDepotMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to store a marble in an extra depot It contains the index of the marble from which he wants to take the marble (human readable)
    StoreResourceInWarehouseMessage
    This class is used to represent the action of adding a marble into a depot of the warehouse It contains: - @marbleBufferIndex: index of the marble he wants to interact (human readable) - @shelfIndex: index of the depot of the warehouse in which he wants to put the resource
    TakenNameMessage  
    WaitingMessage  
    WarehouseSwapMessage
    Packet used to send to the server the will of the player to swap resources between the depots of the warehouse It contains: -@from : index of the depot from which player wants to move the resources (human readable) -@to : index of the depot in which player want to move the resources (human readable)
    WinnerMessage
    Packet sent from Server to client to tell the players the name of the winner
    WrongTurnMessage
